about_the_game:
Did you ever feel like your museum was missing something?


Discover your artistic soul! Paint dinosaur statues and create even more unique museums!

This DLC includes:

  • 10 Dinosaur species to paint
  • 10 poses for each Dinosaur species to arrange your display
  • 2 gameplay modes:
    • Normal (which takes game progression into account)
    • Sandbox (which allows you to paint every Dino from start)
  • 50+ textures for skin, scales etc...
  • 30+ skin patterns and decals
  • 20+ blood decals
  • Full color palette
  • 130+ texture sets with skins
  • 20+ independent textures for free combination with skin textures
  • 30+ additional decals for museum decoration in 2 color variants

Dinosaur Statues!

Lifelike dinosaurs, based on your ideas! This DLC adds 10 statues of 10 dinosaur species with the painting mode which will let you create lifelike dinosaur statues. Use your imagination and paint life-sized figures to make your museum exhibitions even more interesting!

Paint and Spray!

Grab your spray can and add a little personal touch to any dinosaur statue you can lay your hands on! With adjustable scale, rotation and poses, you can spray-paint dinosaurs from large textures to tiny easter eggs. Combine existing decals with each other, creating even more elaborate and complex pieces of art.

Decorate!

Personalize your museum even more! Decorate your museum walls and floors with additional decals related to prehistoric flora and fauna!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570 4GB VRAM / GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: Discover your artistic soul! Become a museum decorator. Paint dinosaur statues and create your own unique museum.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
